name: MSCRMSetOnlineInstanceAdminMode
description: Enables/Disables Admin Mode for a PowerApps/DataVerse/Dynamics 365 environment
author: Wael Hamze

inputs.name: enable
inputs.label: Enable
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to put instance in admin mode. if not selected, admin mode is taken off.

inputs.name: allowBackgroundOperations
inputs.label: Allow Background Operations
inputs.helpMarkDown: Determines whether the environment can run background operations. Background operations are asynchronous operations, such as workflows and synchronization with Microsoft Exchange.

inputs.name: notificationText
inputs.label: Notification Text
inputs.helpMarkDown: The message to diplay when any user attempts to sign in to the environment.
